verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: boasted] [ARG2: to a writer] ' [ARG1: there is nothing in the world like first - rate p**sy '] [ARGM-TMP: in 2000] [ARGM-TMP: while he was being profiled for a magazine] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a new report] .
